title: When I take photos the reds are bright, on my screen later they are duller or more purple- why?
content:
I have looked at my photos on the pc and they look the colour I took them, but print as they look on the phone (dull and off colour). It is reds and pinks that show as dark purple or light purple. Is there a setting on my phone that I am using that is doing this - I am a new Pixel 4a user - and not tech savvy so am finding it frustrating! 
These should be lighter pink, but look purple...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
